data.title: More Ag Equipment Machinery Technology News
data.meta_description: More DTNPF coverage of the latest in ag technology, new/used farm machinery, parts/maintenance, fleet management, vintage restoration, and more.
data.text:
Equipment Roundup

7/8/2024 | 1:18 PM CDT

In this Equipment Roundup, DTN/Progressive Farmer looks at John Deere launching two new Gators; U.S. sales of four-wheel-drive tractors increasing 9.4% from last year during May; a drone company getting new FFA approvals; Bobcat adding remote...

A Look at AGCO's Autonomous Grain Cart

7/3/2024 | 1:39 PM CDT

AGCO gave DTN/Progressive Farmer an up-close look at its new autonomous grain cart retrofit. It will be offering a retrofit package for single cart operations in 2025.

AGCO Rolls Out Autonomous Cart For 2025

7/2/2024 | 12:12 PM CDT

AGCO CEO Eric Hansotia and Precision Ag Leader Seth Crawford recently talked about the manufacturer's new autonomous systems it will begin fielding in 2025.

Severe Solar Storm Pummels Earth

6/28/2024 | 1:00 PM CDT

The Space Weather Prediction Center is reporting a severe, G4 geomagnetic storm on Friday that could affect the quality of signals for navigation satellites for hours at a time.

Equipment Roundup

6/28/2024 | 12:27 PM CDT

In this Equipment Roundup, DTN/Progressive Farmer looks at a John Deere report on the impact of solar storms on its GPS guidance systems; AGCO announcing a 6% reduction to its salaried workforce; New Holland and Bluewhite partnering to integrate...

Deere Reveals New Midsize Tractor Line

6/27/2024 | 8:25 AM CDT

John Deere is launching a new, model year 2025 6M tractor line with 18 models, five frame sizes and engine options ranging from 95 to 250 horsepower.

Ask the Mechanic

6/18/2024 | 10:55 AM CDT

Steve Thompson answers a reader's question about a battery in a Bobcat skid steer that keeps going down when the machine is running and being used.

Deere Recalls Equip Owner's Manuals

6/5/2024 | 6:33 AM CDT

Following a warning issued to John Deere by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, the company has made a new addition to owner's manuals on its equipment that allows independent repair shops to make repairs to emissions systems.

Polaris Unveils 2025 Sportsman 570 ATVs

6/4/2024 | 12:15 PM CDT

Polaris on Tuesday introduced its 2025 lineup of two-passenger Sportsman 570 all-terrain vehicles, including a 6x6 570 carrying 800 pounds of cargo, Sportsman Touring 570 with four trim packages, and the return of the Sportsman X2 570.

Deere Introduces New Combine

6/3/2024 | 3:02 PM CDT

John Deere on Monday introduced the new T6 800 walker combine, uniting many features from the X9 and S7 Series combines with the latest integrated precision ag technology.

Deere Moving Some Loader Production

6/3/2024 | 12:21 PM CDT

John Deere plans to build a new plant in Mexico that will produce mid-frame skid steer loaders and compact track loaders -- affecting workers at its Dubuque, Iowa, production facility. The company also announced that in addition to 650 layoffs already...

Prepare For New Solar Storm on Friday

5/31/2024 | 11:14 AM CDT

A solar storm Friday through early Saturday will not be as severe as the storm that disrupted positioning receivers three weeks ago, but the predicted G2 geomagnetic storm could affect the quality of radio...
